chicks-dig-bikes.title: Why chicks still dig motorcycles deep down inside
chicks-dig-bikes.summary: Modern women still melt inside when they see a powerful man on a powerful bike.

honda-cb1000r-review.title: Honda CB1000R motorcycle review
honda-cb1000r-review.summary: This bike is the orphaned love child of a genius and his sexy mistress. A distinguished gentleman that likes the occasional bar fight. It's the Daniel Craig of motorcycles.

ktm-690-review.title: KTM 690 Duke motorcycle review
ktm-690-review.summary: Roadster with a single piston the size of an ashtray. Featherweight with arm stretching torque. Maximum attack is by far the preferred mode of operation.

yamaha-mt10-review.title: Yamaha MT-10 Duke motorcycle review
yamaha-mt10-review.summary: Deeply evil machine that smiles every time a puppy gets hurt. Wheelies like nothing else. Looks like the result of a magnet dragged through a scrap heap. Excellent speed device nonetheless.
